author: Karen Lamb
quote: A year from now, you may wish you had started today.

author: Seth Godin
quote: If it scares you, it might be a good thing to try.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: George Addair
quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

author: Kurt Cobain
quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are.

author: Michael Nolan
quote: There are many things in life that will catch your eye, but only a few will catch your heart.

author: Wanda Sykes
quote: If you feel like there's something out there that you're supposed to be doing, if you have a passion for it, then stop wishing and just do it.

author: Ella Fitzgerald
quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

author: Les Brown
quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Alan Cohen
quote: Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.

author: Chris Grosser
quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

author: Ivan Turgenev
quote: If we wait for the moment when everything, absolutely everything, is ready, we shall never begin.

author: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Sam Levenson
quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

author: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Thomas Edison
quote: There is no substitute for hard work.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

author: John Wooden
quote: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.

author: Bob Marley
quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.

author: Anonymous
quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.

author: B.B. King
quote: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

author: Carrie Fisher
quote: Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What’s important is the action. You don’t have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.

author: Elliot Page
quote: When we’re growing up there are all sorts of people telling us what to do when really what we need is space to work out who to be.

author: Frederick Douglass
quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.

author: Nido Qubein
quote: Change brings opportunity.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things could fall together.

author: Deborah Day
quote: Recognizing that you are not where you want to be is a starting point to begin changing your life.

author: Rob Siltanen
quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.

author: Angela Davis
quote: I am no longer accepting the things I cannot change. I am changing the things I cannot accept.

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

author: Amanda Gorman
quote: Change is made of choices, and choices are made of character.

author: Sundar Pichai
quote: Failure is not the opposite of success; it is a stepping stone towards it.

author: Vera Wang
quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.

author: Shonda Rhimes
quote: You can waste your lives drawing lines. Or you can live your life crossing them.

author: Diane von Furstenberg
quote: You are the one that possesses the keys to your being. You carry the passport to your own happiness.

author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you… never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

author: Les Brown
quote: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.

author: Kevin Ngo
quote: If you don’t make the time to work on creating the life you want, you’re eventually going to be forced to spend a lot of time dealing with a life you don’t want.

author: George Eliot
quote: It is never too late to be who you might have been.

author: Cesar Chavez
quote: You cannot uneducate the person who has learned to read.

author: Mortimer Adler
quote: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The mind, once stretched by a new idea, never returns to its original dimensions.

author: John Dewey
quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.

author: Herbert Spencer
quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.

author: Claude Bernard
quote: It is what we know already that often prevents us from learning.

author: Confucius
quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.

author: Clay P. Bedford
quote: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives.

author: Mortimer Adler
quote: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.

author: John Updike
quote: You cannot help but learn more as you take the world into your hands. Take it up reverently, for it is an old piece of clay, with millions of thumbprints on it.

author: William Arthur Ward
quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.

author: Abigail Adams
quote: Learning is not attained by chance. It must be sought for with ardour and attended with diligence.

author: Jim Kwik
quote: If knowledge is power, then learning is a superpower.

author: Anton Chekhov
quote: Wisdom… comes not from age, but from education and learning.

author: William Butler Yeats
quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.

author: Michel Legrand
quote: The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: All I have learned, I learned from books.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?

author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach
quote: In youth we learn; in age we understand.

author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach
quote: We are so vain that we even care for the opinion of those we don't care for.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: The shortest answer is doing the thing.

author: J. R. R. Tolkien
quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.

author: J. R. R. Tolkien
quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.

author: J. R. R. Tolkien
quote: It's the job that's never started as takes longest to finish.

author: Walter Anderson
quote: It is only when we take chances that our lives improve. The initial and the most difficult risk we need to take is to become honest.

author: Diane McLaren
quote: Nature has given us all the pieces required to achieve exceptional wellness and health, but has left it to us to put these pieces together.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: John Wooden
quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.

author: Jim Rohn
quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

author: Arlan Hamilton
quote: We don’t just sit around and wait for other people. We just make, and we do.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.

author: Melissa McCarthy
quote: When I believe in something, I’m like a dog with a bone.

author: David Hurley
quote: The standard you walk past is the standard you accept.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.

author: Walt Disney
quote: Get a good idea and stay with it. Dog it, and work at it until it’s done right.

author: Joe Girard
quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.

author: Dave Carolan
quote: Be a positive energy trampoline—absorb what you need and rebound more back.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing—that’s why we recommend it daily.

author: Lily Tomlin
quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much.

author: Dalai Lama
quote: Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.

author: Chris Grosser
quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.

author: Gary Vaynerchuk
quote: Love your family, work super hard, live your passion.

author: George Eliot
quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

author: Nina Simone
quote: You’ve got to learn to leave the table when love’s no longer being served.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: Helen Keller
quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

author: John Wooden
quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.

author: Dr.Seuss
quote: You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!

author: Dr.Seuss
quote: You’ll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut.

author: Dr.Seuss
quote: If you never did you should. These things are fun and fun is good.

author: J. K. Rowling
quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.

author: J. K. Rowling
quote: If you don’t like to read, you haven’t found the right book.
